item.description:
Let's go to brunch at Harvard Gardens.

Please check out their website for the menu and to get directions:

http://www.harvardgar...

The menu does not have prices, but the restaurant people tell me that most items are between $10 to $15.

Please be 99.9% sure you can make it if you reply yes. No-shows are a no-no!!!

Sorry, we can't wait for late-comers because it is an inconvenience for the restaurant and for the rest of the group who have arrived on time. I appreciate your understanding and consideration with this.

Please allow yourself enough time to get there. Parking is tight in the area, so taking the red line is the best way.

If the event gets full, keep checking because often times people cancel a day or two ahead of time.

I will give out my cell phone # to the folks who reply yes.

I will have a bright golden-yellow LL Bean jacket and I'll carry a flower, so it will be easy to find me.

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Brunch at Harvard Gardens
